caption: Citigroup still lagging behind: Return on tangible common equity, Q3 2024 (%)
trend_summary: In Q3 2024, JPMorgan Chase reported the highest Return on Tangible Common Equity (ROTCE) at over 15%. Bank of America and Wells Fargo followed, with ROTCEs between 10% and 15%. Citigroup had the lowest ROTCE among the four banks, at approximately 7%, indicating a significant performance gap with its peers.
author: Pan Yuk
article_title: Citigroup's comeback is capped by regulatory threat
